dcterms:creator: S. Dean
H. Mania
N. Matni
B. Recht
S. Tu
dcterms:description: A benchmark problem for the linear quadratic regulator (LQR) that explores the sample complexity involved in solving LQR problems.
dcterms:title: LQR benchmark problem based on Dean et al.

dcterms:creator: H. Schluter
F. Solowjow
S. Trimpe
dcterms:description: A dataset used for updating Bayesian dynamics models with trajectory data in the context of event-triggered learning for linear quadratic control.
dcterms:title: Bayesian dynamics model update with trajectory data

dcterms:creator: F. Berkenkamp
A. P. Schoellig
dcterms:description: A dataset for a probabilistically robust LQR task that incorporates uncertain dynamics, allowing for safe and robust learning control.
dcterms:title: Probabilistically robust LQR task with uncertain dynamics

dcterms:creator: F. Solowjow
S. Trimpe
dcterms:description: A framework for event-triggered learning that allows for efficient learning in control systems by determining when to learn based on system performance.
dcterms:title: Event-triggered learning (ETL) framework

dcterms:creator: L. Brunke
M. Greeff
A. W. Hall
Z. Yuan
S. Zhou
J. Panerati
A. P. Schoellig
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on learning-based robust control, emphasizing safe learning techniques in robotics and control systems.
dcterms:title: Learning-based robust control

dcterms:creator: F. Solowjow
D. Baumann
C. Fiedler
A. Jocham
T. Seel
S. Trimpe
dcterms:description: A dataset containing closed-loop system data used for Bayesian linear regression, facilitating the analysis of dynamical systems.
dcterms:title: Closed-loop system data for Bayesian linear regression
